name: Dimensions of the Boxy Hop-Dog
description:
A 2D cuboid creature hops around a jungle environ... and you can't help but wonder what the measurements of its various body parts are. We all have weird thoughts when we're on safari. 

Luckily, the mouse doubles as a measuring device; hold down either the left or right mouse button and drag the cursor to reveal a second cursor underneath - as well as the number of pixels that make up the space between them. How accurate will your measurements of the Boxy Hop-Dog be? Whether you're dead on or way, way off, the dimensions change each time you restart the game. It's blocky jungle fun for everyone!

I initially designed this game around using the mouse and keyboard (space bar to open the entry screen/number keys to input values) but I've since gone back in and added a way for it to mostly be played with just the mouse, as long as your mouse has a scroll wheel. You will be able to open the entry screen  with the middle mouse button and add/subtract values by moving the scroll wheel up or down. Windows' on-screen keyboard also works for any keys that need to be pressed!
